meanings.definition: Relating to the writing and study of the lives of saints.
meanings.sent1: The hagiologic texts provided valuable insights into the lives of saints.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often refer to hagiologic works when researching saints.
meanings.sent3: The hagiologic stories were so fascinating that they felt like fairy tales.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of saints was so hagiologic, it was as if she could see their halos.
meanings.sent5: The hagiologic descriptions painted vivid pictures of saintly deeds.

meanings.definition: A book or collection of writings about saints.
meanings.sent1: The library had a rare hagiologic that dated back to the medieval era.
meanings.sent2: Parishioners often borrowed hagiologics from the church's collection.
meanings.sent3: The hagiologic on the top shelf seemed to whisper stories of miracles.
meanings.sent4: In her attic, she discovered a dusty hagiologic filled with ancient tales.
meanings.sent5: The hagiologic was a treasure trove of saintly wisdom and legends.
